food.question: I am yellow and yummy. Monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 A favorite snack for monkeys!
💛 My peel is the color of sunshine.
🍌 You can peel and eat me.

food.question: I am white and cold. I'm made from milk, and you eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🥄 You eat me with a spoon.
🐄 I come from milk.
🥶 I'm very cold and sweet.

food.question: I am long and orange. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 A favorite snack for bunnies.
🧡 I am the same color as a pumpkin.
🌱 I grow in the ground.

food.question: I am round and red. You can bite into me, or make juice with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥤 You can make juice from me.
🔴 I am the color of fire trucks.
🍎 I keep the doctor away.

food.question: I am green and grow on a vine. I am small and sweet.

hints.text: 🟢 I am the color of grass.
🌳 I grow on a vine in bunches.
🍇 I can be green or purple.

food.question: I am yellow, and grow on a cob. You can pop me for a snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You can pop me in a microwave.
🌽 I grow on a stalk.
🐥 Chickens like to eat me.

food.question: I am round and juicy, I can be many colors, and grow in a garden, and you slice me to put on salads or sandwiches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I can be used to make sauces.
🥪 I'm often on sandwiches.
🥗 I add flavor to salads.

food.question: I am made from milk. I can be hard or soft. People eat me on sandwiches or crackers. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Mice sometimes like to eat me.
🥛 I am made from milk.
🥪 I can be put on a sandwich.

food.question: I am small and green. I grow in a pod. You can eat me in soup or as a side dish. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow in a pod.
🥣 I can be put in soup.
🟢 I am the color of a frog.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast. I can be sliced and toasted. People use me to make sandwiches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I'm often used to make sandwiches.
🔥 You can put me in a toaster.
🌾 I'm made from grain.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I am a leafy vegetable
🌱 I grow under the ground, or just above
🐇 Bunnies love to munch on me!

plant.question: I am big and strong and have leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I have a trunk made of wood
🍃 I lose my leaves in the fall
🐿️ Squirrels climb all over me.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell nice. Bees like to visit me to make honey. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I grow in a garden
☀️ I need sunshine to grow
🐝 Bees collect nectar from me.

plant.question: I am long and green and you can eat me. I grow on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am crunchy and juicy
🥪 You can put me on a sandwich
🪴 I have seeds inside.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels like to hide me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I fall from the tree in Autumn
🐿️ Squirrels bury me for winter
🥜 You can eat me!

plant.question: I am a small green plant that covers the ground. You can walk on me barefoot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I feel soft under your feet
⚽ You play games on me
💧 I need water to stay green.

plant.question: I am a red fruit that grows on a vine. You can make juice or sauce out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am often used in pasta sauce
🪴 I'm a fruit, but people think I am a vegetable!
☀️ I love sunshine.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with yellow kernels. You can eat me on the cob or make popcorn. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 My kernels grow in rows
🍿 I can be turned into a yummy snack
🌻 I grow tall in a field.

plant.question: I have a prickly stem and beautiful petals. I come in many colors and some people think I am romantic. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 Be careful of my thorns!
🌹 People give me as a gift.
💧 I need a lot of sunshine and water.

plant.question: I am a tall, strong plant that can live for a very long time. Some of my rings tell you how old I am. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I provide shade on a sunny day.
🦉 Owls like to live in me.
🪵 You can make furniture from me.
